apollo

Interface Table

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Schema._table_class, Schema.sqlite_master, Schema.table_info

    public interface Table
    This represents a Table in the database. Each instance of this is a row. Each field must be public, and the name included in field order. Use the PrimaryKey, NotNull and Bool annotations where appropriate. PrimaryKeys should not have the NotNull annotation. The field can be null, which means the database will automatically assign a value.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Table.Bool
      Used to annotate that a field is a boolean.
      static interface  Table.NotNull
      Used to annotate that a field cannot be null.
      static interface  Table.PrimaryKey
      Used to annotate that a field is a PrimaryKey.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String[] getFieldNames()
      Return an array of the field names.
      java.lang.String[] getIndices() 
      java.lang.String getTableName()
      We highly recommend that the class name matches the table name.
      boolean saveTransactionID()
      This is true if it has a field for the transaction id.

    • Method Detail

      • getFieldNames

        java.lang.String[] getFieldNames()
        Return an array of the field names. The first one should be the primary key. This is needed because reflection does not guarantee a specific order.

      • getTableName

        java.lang.String getTableName()
        We highly recommend that the class name matches the table name. However, there may be some differences such as lower case or underscores. The table name must not have a dot in it.

      • getIndices

        java.lang.String[] getIndices()

      • saveTransactionID

        boolean saveTransactionID()
        This is true if it has a field for the transaction id. The field must be of type long and named "_tid"
